channel.title: Server Hacking Audreyhacking Audrey on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Hacking Audreyhacking Audrey on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: slashdot.org sucks...
item.description: So somehow, a site that I host got slashdotted on monday. It was crazy, I was working on the site around 5:30. I left work and went home, arriving around 6:00. My audrey said that she couldn’t connect to my mail server around 6:10. So i am guessing I lasted roughly 30min. Ughh. I wish i had more ram.. hehe.. check out the slashdot story here
